text:
In this excerpt from build.xml, notice that the javadoc element is closed twice.

<target name="javadoc" depends="compile"
   description="Create Javadoc API documentation">

    <mkdir          dir="${dist.home}/docs/api"/>
    <javadoc sourcepath="src"
                destdir="${dist.home}/docs/api"
           packagenames="*"/>
      <classpath refid="compile.classpath"/>
    </javadoc>

  </target>
creator: jebenson@dstsystems.com

text: This was already fixed in tomcat4.1. Won't be fixed in 4.0. Cleaning up report.
creator: funkman@joedog.org
